**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 133 1.1 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- A crystalline sphere, swirling with constantly shifting constellations, sits atop a _lyrakien staff_, a silver shaft that sparkles with the gentle glow of starlight. [Desnans](/Deities.aspx?ID=5) first created the staves, inspired by the music- and freedom-loving [lyrakien azatas](/Monsters.aspx?ID=34), but these staves are popular with spellcasters of all faiths who like travel, art, or the stars. While wielding a _lyrakien staff_, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus on saving throws against [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93) effects. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Lyrakien Staff **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 133 1.1 **Price** 225 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_guidance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [_summon instrument_](/Spells.aspx?ID=721)
  • **1st** [_concordant choir_](/Spells.aspx?ID=886)
  • **2nd** [_guiding star_](/Spells.aspx?ID=923), [_remove paralysis_](/Spells.aspx?ID=253)
Lyrakien Staff (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 133 1.1 **Price** 920 gp **Bulk** 1 --- The circumstance bonus is +2.
  • **3rd** [_dream message_](/Spells.aspx?ID=90), [_safe passage_](/Spells.aspx?ID=712), [_wanderer's guide_](/Spells.aspx?ID=368)
  • **4th** _concordant choir_, [_dream message_](/Spells.aspx?ID=90), [_freedom of movement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [_remove paralysis_](/Spells.aspx?ID=253)
Lyrakien Staff (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 133 1.1 **Price** 8,600 gp **Bulk** 1 --- The circumstance bonus is +2.
  • **5th** [_safe passage_](/Spells.aspx?ID=712), [_summon celestial_](/Spells.aspx?ID=317) ([azata](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=10) only)
  • **6th** _concordant choir_, [_zealous conviction_](/Spells.aspx?ID=378)
  • **7th** [_cosmic form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=889), _remove paralysis_
name: Lyrakien Staff (Greater)
